about_the_game:
Bleak end is a hand-drawn poetic game about a girl lost in a suddenly faded reality. Immerge yourself in a depressive atmosphere that will confront you with futility and sorrow as you wander around through the entangled labyrinth. Paths that lead nowhere, confused thoughts, darkness reveal deep feelings of being lost and broken.

The game focusing on conveying the emotions though the delicate art, evocative words and melancholic soundtrack. The player will be walking through the platformer maze, revealing the girl's story.

Features
  • 2D platformer-maze
  • Unique hand-drawn 2D art and animation
  • Original Soundtrack
  • There is no narrative voice - only girl's confused thoughts appearing on the walls written in a semi-poetic form
  • Simple controls - only jump and move
